enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Journalism Juniors and above. And JOUR 342 with a C or better or JOUR 368 with a C or better.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: DOHA JOUR 345-0-70 Journalism Residency: News

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Journalism Residency in Newspaper/Online (2 units). Hones reporting and news writing skills through practical assignments, including multimedia opportunities whenever possible, under deadline pressure and close editorial supervision.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: Must enroll and obtain a C or better for JOUR 390-0 Special topics: "Exploring the Future of Digital Journalism". And enroll for JOUR 342 OR JOUR 368 and obtain a C or better.

  • Open to juniors and above JOUR majors only

subject: JOUR
